languages.text: "Больше никого и пальцем не трону". {n}Выдержав ваш взгляд, Соломон криво ухмыляется одним уголком рта.{/n} "Я умею воспитывать и более тонкими методами".
"I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."
languages.original_text: "Больше никого и пальцем не трону". {n}Выдержав ваш взгляд, Соломон криво ухмыляется одним уголком рта.{/n} "Я умею воспитывать и более тонкими методами".

traits.locale_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

"I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

languages.text: 「もう誰にも、指一本触れません」{n}じっと見据えるあなたの視線を受け止めながら、ソロモーンは口元を片方だけわずかに上げて、ゆがんだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「もっとスマートな訓練の方法を知っていますから」
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: 「もう誰にも、指一本触れません」{n}じっと見据えるあなたの視線を受け止めながら、ソロモーンは口元を片方だけわずかに上げて、ゆがんだ笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「もっとスマートな訓練の方法を知っていますから」

languages.text: "Ich werde keinem mehr ein Haar krümmen." {n}Solomorne hält deinem unerbittlichen Blick stand und lächelt schief, wobei ein Mundwinkel zuckt.{/n} "Ich habe subtilere Ausbildungsmethoden."
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde keinem mehr ein Haar krümmen." {n}Solomorne hält deinem unerbittlichen Blick stand und lächelt schief, wobei ein Mundwinkel zuckt.{/n} "Ich habe subtilere Ausbildungsmethoden."

languages.text: « Je ne toucherai plus à un seul de leurs cheveux. » {n}Soutenant votre regard implacable, Solomorne se fend d'un sourire entendu et un tic nerveux agite le coin de sa bouche.{/n} « Je connais des méthodes de dressage plus subtiles. »
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne toucherai plus à un seul de leurs cheveux. » {n}Soutenant votre regard implacable, Solomorne se fend d'un sourire entendu et un tic nerveux agite le coin de sa bouche.{/n} « Je connais des méthodes de dressage plus subtiles. »

languages.text: «No le pondré un dedo encima a nadie más». {n}Sin eludir tu implacable mirada, Solomorne esboza una sonrisa aviesa, levantando una sola de las comisuras de sus labios.{/n} «Conozco métodos de aleccionamiento más sutiles».
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: «No le pondré un dedo encima a nadie más». {n}Sin eludir tu implacable mirada, Solomorne esboza una sonrisa aviesa, levantando una sola de las comisuras de sus labios.{/n} «Conozco métodos de aleccionamiento más sutiles».

languages.text: “我不会再碰他们一根指头了。”{n}在你目不转睛的盯视之下，索罗蒙露出了歪曲的微笑，嘴角扭曲着。{/n}“我有更精妙的训练手段。”
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: “我不会再碰他们一根指头了。”{n}在你目不转睛的盯视之下，索罗蒙露出了歪曲的微笑，嘴角扭曲着。{/n}“我有更精妙的训练手段。”

languages.text: "Artık kimseye elimi kaldırmam." {n}Solomorne, acımasız bakışlarına meydan okurcasına çarpık bir sırıtışla cevap veriyor.{/n} "Daha az göze batan terbiye yöntemlerim de var."
languages.original_text: "I won't lay a finger on anyone else." {n}Withstanding your unrelenting gaze, Solomorne smiles crookedly, one corner of his mouth quirking.{/n} "I have more subtle training methods."

traits.locale_text: "Artık kimseye elimi kaldırmam." {n}Acımasız bakışlarına meydan okurcasına Solomorne çarpık bir sırıtmayla konuşur.{/n} "Daha az göze batan terbiye yöntemlerim de var."
